description: Details of a scheme for treating cooking fumes and odours pursuant to condition 5 of planning permission ref: 170299FUL dated  29/03/2020  for: Change of use from vacant charity shop (A1 Use Class) to restaurant/hot food takeaway (A3/A5 Use Class) including installation of exterior extractor fan to the rear and associated refuse storage provision
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted information pursuant to condition 5 of planning permission
170299FUL dated 29 March 2017 is deemed to be unsatisfactory and does

not meet the requirements of the condition. Council's Regulatory Officer has reviewed the application and raised concerns with the limited details of the report and its conclusions that a very high level of odour will be emitted.
The proposal would therefore fail to protect the interests of the living conditions of the occupiers of the above residential premises in
accordance with policies 1.1(j) of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies
D3 and SI 8 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
